thread.title: Brit Awards 2017: Chris Martin makes surprise appearance for tribute duet with late George Michael
thread.title_full: Brit Awards 2017: Chris Martin makes surprise appearance for tribute duet with late George Michael

author: Jennifer ruby
title: Brit Awards 2017: Chris Martin makes surprise appearance for tribute duet with late George Michael
text:
Brit Awards 2017: Chris Martin makes surprise appearance for tribute duet with late George Michael 
The Coldplay frontman performed a rendition of A Different Corner Wednesday 22 February 2017 21:17 GMT Click to followES Entertainment Tribute: Chris Martin makes a surprise Brits appearance to honour George Michael ITV 
Chris Martin made a surprise appearance at this year’s Brit Awards to pay tribute to the late George Michae l. The Coldplay frontman, who was not scheduled to appear at this year’s ceremony, arrived on stage to sing classic Michael song A Different Corner on Wednesday night, following a tribute from Wham’s Ridgeley, Shirlie Holliman and Pepsi De Macque. While Martin sang one part of the song, a large screen showed Michael singing the accompanying verses. Although many people said that the performance brought a ‘tear’ to their eyes, others weren’t too keen on Martin’s tribute. Wham! and Chris Martin pay tribute to George Michael at the #Brits https://t.co/ZZvjdBvcCY pic.twitter.com/DoBAT9A4C9 — حًنٌٱنٌ عبّدُٱلكريّم (@Hanan_AAKARIM) February 22, 2017 Very fitting tribute to George Michael by Andrew Ridgley and Pepsi & Shirley at the Brits tonight. Not sure that song suited Chris Martin ? — Duncan Platt (@PlattDuncan) February 22, 2017 Awwww George Michael tribute had me in tears. Not so keen on the song they chose but fair play to Chris Martin who will get slated — Lisa J Davidson 💋 (@lisajd1977) February 22, 2017 "Watching the Brits" Oh my! George Michael you have just affected my tearducts yet again. .. #ChrisMartin , you did good — lisa grumbley (@1littleone1) February 22, 2017 "Watching the Brits" Oh my! George Michael you have just affected my tearducts yet again. ..#ChrisMartin , you did good,” one person wrote. Another added: “Was welling up after that speech from Pepsi, Shirley and Andrew. Then Chris Martin comes on and murders A Different Corner!” Brit Awards 2017: red carpet fashion Brit Awards 2017: red carpet fashion 1/30 Brit Awards 2017
